about_the_game:
《The Professor》sets in the modern age in a world filled with magic and highly advanced technology, starring a University professor majoring in Astrology who accidentally opens a book that has been passed down from generations in his family is forbidden to open, as the book is used to banish evils and monsters from different realms and time ages as a cage, the professor himself's family is the guardian of this book, this causing the banished monsters and demons to return to reality, to bring back peace to reality and banish these evils and monsters again, united with three of his top students, they begin a journey to fight monsters in different timezone and grounds through time portal.

The game has a lot of features including:

· 4 playable characters with customizable outlooks and outfits

· Collectibles (Weapons, Outfits, Cosmetics) across different maps

· Intense boss fight with a variety of different boss designs inspired by map settings

· Random world events include NPC fighting each other to make the game world more alive.

· Focused on fantasy glowing VFX effects and special effects of different weapons.

· Different characters have different focuses of elemental ability trees, 4 different brands to unlock include fire, ice, lightning, and Astro (cosmos power)

A lot more features will be introduced in further updates as a small studio develops this game, any comments are welcome to help us improve! Thank you!

content_descriptors.notes: General mature content only includes blood and killing monsters.

detailed_description:
《The Professor》sets in the modern age in a world filled with magic and highly advanced technology, starring a University professor majoring in Astrology who accidentally opens a book that has been passed down from generations in his family is forbidden to open, as the book is used to banish evils and monsters from different realms and time ages as a cage, the professor himself's family is the guardian of this book, this causing the banished monsters and demons to return to reality, to bring back peace to reality and banish these evils and monsters again, united with three of his top students, they begin a journey to fight monsters in different timezone and grounds through time portal.

The game has a lot of features including:

· 4 playable characters with customizable outlooks and outfits

· Collectibles (Weapons, Outfits, Cosmetics) across different maps

· Intense boss fight with a variety of different boss designs inspired by map settings

· Random world events include NPC fighting each other to make the game world more alive.

· Focused on fantasy glowing VFX effects and special effects of different weapons.

· Different characters have different focuses of elemental ability trees, 4 different brands to unlock include fire, ice, lightning, and Astro (cosmos power)

A lot more features will be introduced in further updates as a small studio develops this game, any comments are welcome to help us improve! Thank you!
name: The Professor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 1400 or Intel® Core™ i5-6600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 470, NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 960 or Intel® Arc™ A580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit (latest update) or Windows® 11 64 Bit (latest update)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 1600X or Intel® Core™ i7-6700K
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600XT or NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080Ti / RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 60 GB available space

short_description: 《The Professor》is a third-person point of view adventure-based game, characters are customizable, game contains various of different map settings, different bosses, intense battles, variety choices of weapons varying from different timezone, the exploration awaits.
